item.title: Polymarket Launches YZY Zone, Where Only 2% of Participating Funds Believe in "Ye's Twitter Hack"
item.description: On August 21st, based on the information on the relevant page, Polymarket has initiated the YZY Zone. The topics involve "Has Kanye West's Official Twitter Account Been Hacked?", "Will Hayden Davis Go to Jail This Year?", "Can YZY's Fully Diluted Valuation Reach $10 Billion by Friday?", etc.As of the time of this writing, 13% of the participating funds hold the belief that "Hayden Davis will go to jail this year," and 2% of the participating funds believe that "Kanye West's official Twitter account was hacked."

item.title: Jito Governance Forum releases JIP-25 and JIP-XX proposals
item.description: August 21st. The Jito Governance Forum announced the JIP-25 and JIP-XX proposals. JIP-25 suggests increasing the number of validators from 200 to 400, getting rid of super-optimization for voting power, and ranking validators based on commission, MEV commission, validator age, and the reverse order of voting power.On the other hand, JIP-XX enables JitoSOL stakers to express delegation preferences to multiple eligible validators. JitoSOL in DeFi applications is allocated to compliant DeFi validators, and the remaining stake is distributed according to the JIP-25 proposal. It is expected that these two proposals will enhance the liquidity of JitoSOL and the scale of DeFi applications.

item.title: Crypto KOL: Almost certainly Hayden Davis was involved in the release of YZY token, with a pattern highly similar
item.description: On August 21st, the cryptocurrency KOL scooter (@imperooterxbt), who had previously disclosed insider information about the LIBRA token, claimed that he is 99% certain that Hayden Davis was involved in launching the YZY token because the YZY pattern is very similar to that of LIBRA from a few months ago.

item.title: YZY Money Official Documentation includes a "Class Action Waiver" provision
item.description: On August 21st, based on the official YZY Money documentation, the terms involve a "Class Action Waiver." "To the extent allowed by law, you consent not to initiate, join, or participate in any class action lawsuit regarding any claims, disputes, or controversies you may have against any protected party. You agree that the court may issue injunctions and prohibit such litigation or remove you from the litigation. You also agree to bear any attorney's fees and litigation costs incurred by any protected party seeking such remedies."In previous news, Kanye West launched the YZY meme coin on Solana. According to an estimate by a Coinbase executive, the new Kanye token is at least 94% held internally.

item.title: A certain insider spent $450,000 to buy YZY at an average price of $0.24, paying a 129 SOL priority fee.
item.description: On August 21st, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, an insider utilized 2 wallets to spend 450,000 USDC to purchase 1.89 million YZY at a price of $0.24. Subsequently, they sold 1.59 million YZY at a price of $2.12, exchanging it for 3.37 million USDC.He still retains 303,425 YZY (valued at $510,000), with profits exceeding $3.4 million (+760%).In order to ensure being the first to enter, one wallet even paid a 129 SOL ($24,000) priority fee.

item.title: WLFI Treasury minted an additional 205 million USD1 to the WLFI Treasury this morning.
item.description: On August 21st, according to official information, WLFI added a minting amount of 2.05 billion USD to the WLFI Treasury this morning.

item.title: Singapore's DBS Bank Launches Tokenized Structured Note on Ethereum
item.description: On August 21st, DBS, Singapore's largest bank, announced the issuance of tokenized structured notes on the Ethereum public chain. The notes are targeted at qualified and institutional investors on Singapore local exchanges such as ADDX, DigiFT, and HydraX. The first product is a participation note linked to cryptocurrency. It settles in cash when prices rise and limits losses when prices fall. The note unit has been reduced from the traditional $100,000 to $1,000, enhancing liquidity and trading convenience.It is reported that the trading volume of related products exceeded $1 billion in the first half of 2025, with a nearly 60% quarter-on-quarter growth in Q2. DBS will subsequently expand to stocks and credit-linked notes. (CoinDesk)

item.title: LookOnChain: SOL briefly touched $190
item.description: On August 21st, according to HTX market data, SOL briefly reached $190 and is currently trading at $189.05.

item.title: iOS Release Important Security Patch, Fixing Exploited Zero-Day Vulnerability
item.description: On August 21st, as per official channels, iOS has rolled out a crucial security patch version 18.6.2.According to the analysis by security expert Ryan Naraine, this version is set to address a zero-day vulnerability that has been actively exploited.

item.title: LookOnChain: Gate Alpha Launches YZY
item.description: August 21st. As per official information, Gate Alpha has launched Kanye West's YZY globally.It is reported that YZY is a meme coin put out by the renowned rapper Kanye West. He tweeted on his official account today, stating "YEEZY MONEY is here, a brand new economic system constructed on the blockchain," and released the token contract address.
